issue.title: Client fails to connect to the server because the server begins to listen only later

content.raw:
You should be able to test this manually by:

1. In one terminal, run `gzclient`.
2. In another terminal, run `gzserver`.
3. You should see the client come up and connect to the server.

Under the hood,  the `gazebo` command just runs step 1 and step 2.
content.html:
You should be able to test this manually by:

  1. In one terminal, run gzclient.
  2. In another terminal, run gzserver.
  3. You should see the client come up and connect to the server.

Under the hood, the gazebo command just runs step 1 and step 2.
